review: my seven year old child was crying endlessly due to gas in tummy ,I was alone with no other family member , they got his sonography done , it was clear , so they said that the sonographist is not experienced , we need to get another done , **** * ****** ***** **** was escalated to an appendix problem .*** *** * ***** *** ***** ********** ** ***** **** ********** ******** ******* ******** **** ******* **** **** ** **** ***** *** ** ******* *even their swipe machines were not working and were demanding for cash saying out bank account has been closed ..it was a bad bad disheartening experience ** **** ********* ** ** ***** *** *** *** *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: History of patient was taken my one doctor then passed on to senior doctor who just asks to go for urine test and wait for report. Once the report comes the senior doctor does not even look the patient and some different  ****** doctor prescribes the medicine *** **** *** **** **** *** ********
